mapper.select: select c.collection_id collectionId, c.collection_name collectionName, c.collection_intro collectionIntro, c.grant_id grantId from collection c, (select m.member_id, mc.collection_id, mc.invite from member m, member_collection mc where m.member_id = mc.member_id and m.member_id = #{memberId} and mc.invite ='false') mc where c.collection_id = mc.collection_id
